posts.post_content:
Selling a nice portrait of Hall of Famer Rube Marquard PSA 4 with a Piedmont 350 back. asking $180.00 delivered. Paypal, check,or money order ok. If using Paypal, send funds as gift or cash advance.
[IMG]http://i298.photobucket.com/albums/mm269/lharri3600/t206/MARQUARD20PORTRAIT.jpg[/IMG]

I noticed you moved this Rube Marquard PSA 4 to ebay the other day. I was the high bidder up until today then poof! It vanished from my list of cards I was bidding on. You ended the auction early. If a card is listed on ebay, it should be listed for the full duration of the auction. I would have made an offer to you for this card but when I saw it move to ebay, I decided I would win it there. I planned on winning that card. I think I will start a thread asking if it is ethical to end an auction early using you as an example. What do you think?

Update: Thanks for talking to me, you're a stand-up guy.
